scene_2.action: Test speaks to Test2 about work
scene_2.dialogue:
Test: - Hi
Test2: - Hello
Test: -you are cool
Test2: -thank you

scene_3.title: Scene 3 – The Mayor's Response
scene_3.action: The mayor receives news about Sarah's investigation. He's outwardly calm but his hands betray his nervousness. He gives orders to his staff.
scene_3.dialogue:
Blackwood: "Handle this situation, Lisa. I don't care how."
Lisa: "The detective assigned to the case is Marcus Chen."
Blackwood: "Marcus Chen? That could be a problem."
scene_3.goal: Introduce the antagonist and show his reaction to the investigation threat

scene_4.title: Scene 4 – The Breakthrough
scene_4.action: Sarah works late into the night, piecing together evidence. Her apartment is cluttered with research materials. She discovers a crucial connection.
scene_4.dialogue: Sarah: (to herself) "Blackwood Construction... city contracts... missing money... It all connects."
scene_4.goal: Show Sarah's investigative process and the breakthrough moment
scene_4.conflict_stakes: Finding the truth vs. personal safety

scene_5.title: Scene 5 – The Confrontation
scene_5.action: The final confrontation. Sarah and Marcus have evidence, but Blackwood has backup. Tense standoff with guns drawn.
scene_5.dialogue:
Blackwood: "You should have left well enough alone."
Sarah: "The truth always comes out, Mayor."
Marcus: "It's over, Blackwood. We have everything."
scene_5.goal: Climactic scene with all major characters. High stakes confrontation
scene_5.conflict_stakes: Justice vs. corruption, life and death
